name: Salt Devil
damage_resistances: acid, cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The salt devil makes two Scimitar attacks and one Water-Draining Claw attack.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Water-Draining Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a creature that isn't a Construct or Undead, it must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Plants, Oozes, and creatures with the Amphibious, Water Breathing, or Water Form traits have disadvantage on this saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target also suffers one level of exhaustion.

actions.name: Teleport (3/Day)
actions.desc: The salt devil magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Summon Devil (1/Day)
actions.desc: The salt devil magically calls 1d4 gnolls that are Fiends with the salt devil's damage resistances and immunities. The salt devil has a 25 percent chance of calling one salt devil instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of the devil and obeying its telepathic commands. The creatures remain for 1 hour, until the devil dies, or until the devil dismisses them as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the salt devil's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The salt devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Salt-Encrusted Hide
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the salt devil or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) slashing damage.
